mapper.select: SELECT bsr.name role_name, bmp.interface_url from bs_role_permission_relation brpr inner join bs_menu_permission bmp on bmp.id = brpr.permission_id inner join bs_sys_role bsr on bsr.id = brpr.role_id where bmp.interface_url is not null

SELECT bmp.id permission_id, bmp.name, bmp.sort, bmp.icon, if(brpr.id is null, false , true) has_menu_power from bs_menu_permission bmp left join bs_role_permission_relation brpr on bmp.id = brpr.permission_id and brpr.role_id = #{roleId} where bmp.menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.delete: delete brpr from bs_role_permission_relation brpr inner join bs_menu_permission bmp on bmp.id = brpr.permission_id where brpr.role_id = #{roleId} and bmp.menu_id = #{menuId}
